scripts.generate-posts: cd generated && lodash-template-cli ../templates/post.html posts/*.json ../public && cd .. && renamer --find .json --replace .html 'public/posts/*'
scripts.generate-index: cd generated && lodash-template-cli ../templates/index.html index.json ../public && cd .. && renamer --find .json --replace .html 'public/index.json'
scripts.generate: node generate.js && npm run-script generate-posts && npm run-script generate-index
